caption: Don’t understand all the hype about the sandwich. Bland, salty and underwhelming overall.

BEST SANDWICH PLACE EVER. When I think about great food, sandwiches never came to my mind until I came to this place.  Don't get my wrong I like schlotzskys, fire house subs, etc but This place takes it to a different level.  If I said this …
Horrible experience. Food is mediocre at best. And the so called chef is a hack.

Love the porcheta sandwich, but today got their carnitas and they're terrible!! Weird texture and just taste like oranges, Yuk. Ordered potatoes and said how much I love the rosemary salt,  got home and they had no salt put on. Extremely disappointed 😞

Do yourself a favor and go there immediately! Everything is well seasoned, moist, and incredible.  If the porchetta sandwich is available, GET IT! Don't forget to get a side of the roasted potatoes--it's been cooking in the rotisserie drippings. Bravo!
Wow savory!
Their signature sandwich on that great bread was worth it.  Every bite was full of flavor and was moist and delicious with the onion jam providing a extra happy tang. I could have eaten it all day.

Hello porchetta! (pronounced pour - KEHT - tah) Don't you look and smell good spinning round and round, drawing everyone within aroma's radius in, and teasing us all with the image of that glistening pork skin while roasting away.  The …
Decent, but way over priced, go-to Costco and save a hundred

I stood in line this afternoon to try your porchetta sandwich. Gorgeous day so the wait wasn't too bad. Great idea and concept 💡! HOWEVER! Very overwhelming herbs flavor, you can barely taste the porchetta. The porchetta was extremely …

We ordered of course the porchetta sandwich and a 1/2 lb porchetta and 1/2 a roasted chicken.  Each bite is just delicious.  Very kind people serving the guests.  Price point is just superb - the entire bill came to about $ 27.  1/2 a Mary's roasted chicken set you back - ready for this $ 7.5!  Unbelievable price for San Francisco!
The best sandwich in the world

I always come back for the porchetta sandwich (Acme bread + absolutely amazing porchetta with a crackly skin + onion jam + arugula)! It's honestly one of the best things to eat in the bay area in my opinion, and the one thing in the …
It was GREAT.   Food was Excellent, and Exceptional.
Long-established food truck whipping up freshly cooked rotisserie meats & seasonal vegetable sides.
Fast and friendly service. Delicious food!! I highly recommend thisplace!!

(Translated by Google) Porchetta Sandwich is very delicious. The bread is very good. The lettuce inside is full of sesame leaves. The potato is roasted with the oil under the roast chicken. The roast chicken is a bit dry, which is a pity.  (Original) Porchetta Sandwich非常好吃, 麵包搭配得非常好, 裡面的生菜是滿滿的芝麻葉.馬鈴薯是跟著烤雞下的油一起搭配烤, 烤雞有一點點乾, 比較可惜.

(Translated by Google) The line is so long! But I'm shrinking very fast. Por Porkta Sandwich I loved the meat I think it might be a little salty  (Original) 줄이 엄청 길어요! 그래도 줄 엄청 빨리 줄어드는 편입니다. 돼지 살코기 샌드위치인 porchetta sandwich를 시키시면 됩니다! 고기를 정말 많이 넣어주셔서 좋았어요! 조금 짜게 느껴지실 수도 있을 것 같아요 ㅎㅎ 목토에 파머스 마켓에 오시면 들려보세요
Porchetta sandwich was amazing. Bursting with flavors, crispy skin, savory, juicy meat that melts in the mouth. Just fabulous.
Grabbed a bowl from the truck and really liked he Original Gangster. Yummy...and I would like to believe super healthy.
So I have been briefed about the Porchetta sandwich by my significant other and it was nothing short of amazing. This is one of the best sandwiches I have ever had.

If you are at the farmers market you must get the porchetta sandwich from here it is absolutely delicious, the meat is slow cooked for hours and they crush up some of the skin and put it on the sandwich as well to give it a nice crispiness …
Amazing porchetta roll/sandwich

(Translated by Google) Grilled pork burger at second visit Chewy bread with caramelized onion sauce and sesame leaves, roasted pork skin and hand-pulled pork, superb The roast chicken with spices is also full of aroma  (Original) 二訪的烤豬肉漢堡 帶有嚼勁的麵包夾著熬到焦糖化的洋蔥醬和芝麻葉、還有烤得焦香的豬皮及手撕豬肉，超讚的 香料烤雞也是香氣四溢
I assumed it would taste similar to a rotisserie from TJ's or Safeway but I was way wrong.  Very juicy & flavorful.
When I took my first bite of the porchetta sandwich, I saw God and became one with all existence.  It was that amazing.  Highly recommended!
The foods are all so good! Absolutely delicious!!
As they fly by me doing like 95 on the highway! Wreckless

(Translated by Google) The roast pork sandwich is very delicious and the serving size is very good. It is very recommended that the two eat a serving, and one person is too full.  (Original) 爐烤豬肉三明治非常好吃，份量很足，非常建議兩人分食一份就好，一個人一份太飽了。

(Translated by Google) Because I am afraid that the crowd will wait too long, the food has already been prepared first. I can get the meal immediately after the meal is finished. The food is not hot enough is a small shortcoming, but it is still delicious.  (Original) 因為怕人群等待太久，所以食物已經有先做好，點完餐立刻可以拿到餐點，食物不夠熱是個小缺點，但還算好吃。
Pls try porchetta sandwich, you will love it
Great sandwiches
you will not be disappointed in the menu and service. the staff was very welcoming and sociable. it has a good atmosphere.
the staff was very friendly and attentive.
it has a good interior. food is similar to a cafe in portland i loved.
Oh the penchetta sandwich what a feast as well as the roasted brussel sprouts just delicious!
The porchetta sandwich is famous in the City, and I highly recommend it.  Only open Thursdays and Fridays.
The best chicken ever I will never eat a Safeway chicken again I know where and when they are in SF please try them you’ll feel the same
The best sandwich ever. Don't forget the potatoes with the special salt and the chicken is great to eat or make a soup.

Awesome! At the Ferry Building Farmer's Market, this pop-up stall had their rotisserie going at market open. There was no line early on, so get an early brunch.  I can't imagine that the lines wouldn't be much longer nearer to lunch, but it …
Still in line for a long time but I got the porchetta very good this is my second time I shared with my friend she loved it

Rude service! “We don’t do samples!”, barked a woman with glasses and poorly-dyed aqua-color hair. Why not? Every vendor there (farmer’s market in Pacifica today) offered samples except these jerks. Ridiculous.
Really good porcetta sandwich (great bun too) and the roast chicken with potatoes cooked in chicken fat is amazing. The skin is not too oily and well-charred. Seasoned well and not dry at all
Went there for their famous porchetta sandwich but it was sold out :( but the friendly staff gave a lil piece of porchetta free of charge😂 it was good. Crunchy but kinda oily.

Inconsistent portions, under-salted meat, over-salted potatoes, bone in my sandwich, inefficient and confusing service (no order numbers, people just grab food as it becomes ready and whoever is most greedy gets it first).  Tasty enough, but not as good as the hype!

This is an absolute must! The porchetta is amazing. Crispy skin, tender pork, perfectly seasoned. Acme bread, caramelized onions!!! So good! I try to get there early because the line can be long, but it goes quick and is worth the wait! …
chicken and potatoes combo.!! yammy
(Translated by Google) good to eat! Must go to San Francisco  (Original) 好吃！來舊金山必去

Went to San Francisco for a quick weekend trip and knew I had to find this sandwich...seen it on one of the food channels and it was everything I hoped it would taste like and more...what's traveling from Florida just to get a great porketta sandwich!
One of the best sandwiches we have had in San Francisco. We had the porchetta sandwich and it was juicy and crunchy at the same time. Really fantastic.

(Translated by Google) Porchetta sandwich is a must-try food in San Francisco. His method is to tie the pork with the skin and grill it. The taste is very special. Pork's Q flesh and crispy skin are a perfect match. You can taste the tender …

First, as of this post the hours are incorrect on this location in Google Maps. In general the truck is open on Thursdays 10AM-2PM and Saturdays 8AM-2PM at this location (check the website as perhaps this will change). Second, it's not in …

I bought a whole chicken and large potatoes at the Grand Avenue Farmers Market on July 15, 2017. I had it before and it was great. But this time the chicken was very dry and under seasoned and the potatoes were undercooked. I must admit, I …
I seriously had to throw away the chicken sandwich. It had more chicken fat and skin than lean meat. It had no flavor and disgusting.
If you've never had the chance to try The Roli Roti Food Truck, you're missing the BEST rotisserie pork, chicken, lamb, & tri tip sandwich ever! Seriously!
Best food truck ever
If you haven't had their porchetta sandwich, boy are you missing out! I saw one of the guys mop up the juices and fat on the chopping board with the bread slices, and I shed a year of joy

In A Nutshell:  -If you live 45 minutes from a place that has great food, would you drive up just to grab a bite and then drive right back? -If you said YES, then Roli Roti Gourmet Rotisserie is the place to grab a porchetta sandwich. …
Worth the wait in line. A bit more oil than my previous visit but still good! ❤

If you like pork, you must have their porchetta sandwich, which has their freshly roasted pork. If you're lucky, you'll get a decent amount of the wonderfully tasty and crunchy skin. The line can get long at peak times at the Saturday Farmer's Market, but it's worth it.
chicken!

While I have yet to try their famous porchetta sandwich I was able to try their chicken and potatoes. I had ordered their 1/4 chicken and potatoes combo. The potatoes were absolutely phenomenal. I could eat a whole meal of just potatoes. …

Best money you'll ever spend on a porchetta sandwich.  Do come early and be prepared to stand in line.  The cart moves around during different days; on Thursday it's in front of Gots; on Saturday it's at the south end of the Ferry building - near Sur la table.
One of my favorite food trucks, great views on the pier
I had roli roti when I attended an interior designer event. Really good sandwich and potatoes. The staff was really nice as well. I really want to eat here again when I get the chance. :)

One of the Cuesa Farmers Market stars.  The porchetta sandwich is unique and delicious, with onion marmalade and crispy pork skin.  If you have a large appetite don't forget a side of potatoes seasoned with herb salt.  A wonderful place to go on sataurday afternoons.
